title: Bug 10022 - Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, regardless of whether a manual build is needed or not.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled if a manual build is needed.
SR: To reproduce the issue, go to the Java perspective and open the context-sensitive popup menu. The 'Build' action should be enabled regardless of the build status.
